alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:02PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Johnson County through 330 PM CDT... At 302 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Woodland, or 9 miles northwest of Clarksville, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Woodland... Oak Grove in Johnson County... Hunt... Wolf Pen Campground... Harmony... Ozone... Union City... Oark... Yale... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County
